document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Pink </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">career </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">close </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Portentous </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">knows? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">imitate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">these </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">neighbors </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">fleet </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">In </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Awe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">innocence, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">meet. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Whose pink career may have a close
